attributes.description: This dashboard shows Vulnerability  logs collected by the Sysdig integration.

params.markdown:
**Navigation**

**Sysdig**

- [Alerts Overview](#/dashboard/sysdig-fae0ccf1-e806-4876-a7fa-7258b094b15b)
- [Security Events Overview](#/dashboard/sysdig-d0ac6062-d4da-4f63-948d-4aea617909bf)
- **Vulnerability Overview**

**Overview**

This dashboard displays key statistics and visualizations derived from vulnerability logs collected via the Sysdig integration. A line chart shows the trend of critical CVEs over time, enabling teams to monitor changes in threat exposure. Key metrics display current counts of critical and high vulnerabilities, as well as additional insights such as the number of vulnerabilities with no known exploit, those with available fixes, and those confirmed as exploitable. A doughnut chart highlights critical and high vulnerabilities that have available fixes, helping prioritize remediation efforts. Supporting visualizations, including a bar chart of exploitable vulnerabilities and a pie chart of the top affected namespaces, guide teams in identifying and addressing the most impacted areas.

[**Integrations Page**](/app/integrations/detail/sysdig/overview)
